title: Online Flipped Hospital Clerkship Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical/pharmaceutical knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Blended learning program for enhancing practical competencies in a non-face-to-face educational environment post-COVID-19, designed for working professionals to participate flexibly outside work hours.

learning_goals: Following the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate), learners can integrate online content and hands-on practice to explain inpatient care processes.
Through virtual simulations and case studies, learners can specify three or more concrete roles of pharmacists in inpatient clerkship.
Using video/image materials and collaboration tools, learners can visualize hospital field scenarios and develop effective communication strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
